Darkfate/Blacknightmare:

Darkfate followed Blight. Blacknightmare was calmed down and 
answered "What are test's rules? What have I to do?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Blight: "Only one may take the test. It is not a written one. Now 
> then come with me and we shall begin."
> 
> Blight smirked as he walked through one of the walls which 
afterwards 
> opened for Darkfate to enter. Elsewhere, a crane slowly deposited 
> Blacknightmare in a room with no light or any fixtures of any kind. 
> However a moment later a blue orb flew up to him and three paths 
were 
> lit up on the floor.
> 
> Ball: "Hello, we are now here for you to take a test. Pass and the 
> reward will be great, fail and you and Darkfate die."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Darkfate:::
> > 
> > "I should take the test too"Replied Darkfate "it's a big risk, 
but 
> > rewards is worthy... What do you said?"
